title: Je suis un sentimental
text:
Je suis un sentimental is a 1955 French-Italian <a href="crime%20film">crime film</a> directed by <a href="John%20Berry%20%28film%20director%29">John Berry</a>.
Plot.
Barney Morgan is a reporter who works for a French <a href="Magazine">journal</a>. His <a href="editor-in-chief">editor-in-chief</a> Rupert finds his lover Alice murdered. His boss is the main <a href="suspect">suspect</a> but Barney doesn't believe his boss could possibly be a <a href="murderer">murderer</a>. Subsequently he tries to prove the man's innocence.
Barney suspects Alice's husband and gathers enough <a href="circumstantial%20evidence">circumstantial evidence</a> to make his point. But the <a href="widower">widower</a>'s lawyer can prove he didn't do it neither. Barney concedes he was wrong and commences a new investigation.
Digging deeper he discovers something about the journal's <a href="publisher">publisher</a> and especially about the publisher's son Oliver. While finding the real killer and proving his guilt Barney wins the heart of beautiful Marianne.
